game.title: Find the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Locate and retrieve the lost treasure from the ruins.
game.description: Long ago, a wealthy merchant hid his treasure in an ancient ruin. The map to its location has been passed down through generations. Your mission is to find it and bring it back to your king.

task.objective: Obtain the treasure map from the old library in Camelot.
task.description: The map to the lost treasure is kept in a locked room of the old library in Camelot. You'll need to find a way to access it.

task.objective: Follow the clues in the map and reach the ruins.
task.description: The map has several cryptic clues that will lead you to the location of the ruins. Follow them carefully, but be warned: dangerous creatures might inhabit the area.

task.objective: Retrieve the treasure and bring it back to Camelot.
task.description: The treasure is well guarded by dangerous creatures, traps, and puzzles. Be prepared for a challenge. Once you have retrieved the treasure, return it to King Arthur in Camelot.
